question: The Central Pollution Control Board has deployed 50 teams to inspect pollution-causing activities in which state/UT?
explanation:
The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) has deployed 50 teams in Delhi NCR, to inspect pollution-causing activities in the National Capital. This has been done in view of the pollution during the upcoming winter.
Ministry of Environment has stated that 95% of the pollution caused in Delhi is on account of local factors like dust, construction activities, biomass burning etc and only 4% is caused by stubble burning.
